classroom.name: product-container
classroom.style: max-width: 1110px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; margin-inline: auto;

classroom.name: hero-container
classroom.style: gap: 24px; display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center;

classroom.name: hero-div
classroom.style: display: flex; flex-direction: column; max-width: 445px; width: 100%;

classroom.name: hero-section
classroom.style: display: flex; flex-direction: column; margin-top:16px; gap:32px;

classroom.name: hero-title
classroom.style: color: black; font-weight: bold; font-size:40px; line-height:44px; letter-spacing: 1.43px;

classroom.name: hero-cart-div-cart-button
classroom.style: background-color: #D87D4A; width: 160px; min-height: 48px; color: white; border: none; font-size: 13px; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: 1px; cursor: pointer; transition: 150ms; display: flex; align-items:center; justify-content: center;

classroom.name: additional-container
classroom.style: gap: 120px; margin-top: 160px; display: flex; justify-content: space-between;

classroom.name: additional-features
classroom.style: max-width: 635px; width: 100%; display: flex; flex-direction: column;

classroom.name: p-description
classroom.style: color: rgba(0,0,0,0.5); margin-top: 32px; font-weight: 500; font-size: 15px; line-height: 25px; white-space: pre-line;

classroom.name: additional-box

mediaQueries.style: flex-direction: row; max-width: 100%; display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;

classroom.style: gap: 32px; max-width: 350px; width: 100%; display: flex; flex-direction: column;

classroom.name: additional-box-ul
classroom.style: list-style: none; margin: 0; padding: 0; display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 8px;

classroom.name: gallery-container
classroom.style: max-width: 1110px; width: 100%; margin-top: 160px; display: grid; grid-template: 'i1 i3' 'i2 i3'; gap: 32px 30px; justify-content: center;

classroom.name: like-container
classroom.style: max-width: 1110px; width: 100%; margin-top: 160px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; gap: 64px;

classroom.name: like-container > ul:nth-of-type(1)
classroom.style: margin-inline: auto; padding: 0; list-style: none; max-width: 1110px; gap: 24px; width: 100%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between;

classroom.name: like-container > ul:nth-of-type(1) > li
classroom.style: max-width: 350px; width: 100%; gap: 40px; display: flex; flex-direction: column;

classroom.name: like-container > ul:nth-of-type(1) > li > section
classroom.style: display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; gap: 32px;

children.style: margin-block: 79px 56px; font-weight: 500; font-size: 15px; color: rgba(0,0,0,0.5); line-height: 25px; transition: 150ms;
